title: DSC 209 Project 2
description: In this assignment, you will grapple with how to design visualizations ethically by crafting two different, opposing perspectives to the same question posed about a single dataset. Once this assignment is complete, we will (anonymously) peer review each otherâ€™s visualizations.

title: MTA ROAS Optimization
description: This script seeks to define marketing channel spend and attributed revenue to a dimnishing return curve that can then be used to predict return on ad spend (ROAS), and determine an optimially omni-channel budgeting strategy.

title: DSC 209 Project 1
description: In this assignment, you will design an expository visualization to clearly communicate an idea based on a small data set. In addition, you must provide a rigorous rationale for your design choices. You should in theory be ready to explain the contribution of every pixel in the display towards your expository goals.
